0.5.name: wordpress/iphone-webclip-manager
0.5.description: Have an iPhone or iPod Touch? Wonder how all those sites have a custom bookmark for the homescreen? Well wonder no more and get your own custom webclip icon quickly and easily. With this plugin you can make a custom icon for your wordpress site or your wordpress multiuser site (yep this plugin will allow each individual WPMU blog to have full support for custom webclips).
